name: Snack Slice
description:
Snack Slice is a mini puzzle game about slicing objects to feed these stupid dumb looking idiots.

There's not much too it, just 20 levels that are all fairly easy.

Controls:

  • Mouse click, drag, release to slice
  • R to restart level
  • Esc to go back to main menu

This is the first mini project I'm gonna make in order to develop my project management skills (cause I suck ass at it!!)

This game was made in about 5 days, so let's see how quickly I can put together another game.
